name: Drifting Shmifting
description:
School project. Read manual below (please).

I wanted to make a game where the player could mess around a playground of sorts with a slide-y car. I hope you enjoy my trimester project!

Uploading this on the last week of school, so that's cool.

KNOWN BUG: Car is slightly slower in fullscreen. I may or may not work on it.

WASD to drive, but don't brake with the back arrow, use Space instead. C for cinematic cam, V to look back.
